text: Avo vanhu vakapusa (vanonamata zviumbwa nemidzimu, maJudha nevanyengedzi) vachati: “Chii chaita kuti maMuslim vatendeuke kubva kuQiblah yavo (uko kwainamata maMuslim akatarisa kuJerusarema), iyo yavaigaro tarira vachiita munamato.” Iti (iwe Muhammad (SAW)): “Allah ndivo muridzi wekumabvazuva nekumadokero. Vanotungamirira mugwara rakatwasuka ani nani wavanoda.”
